com.chbase

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chbase.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    The connection serves as the main pipe to HealthVault. It formats requests into a HealthVault envelope ensuring any security handshakes occur properly. It uses underlying Transport and Authenticator classes to help.
